Posts.Content: So excited for you. I just started Arimidex and Zometa and my poor joints are sore and stiff. But I am going to stick it out. So happy that you are doing so well. Best wishes Paula
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: Just fyi, not trying to be smart or rude but my onc said never use Vitamin C while in chemo as it can interfere with the efficiency of the chemo and actually stop it from working. Maybe just check if this is still the case as I had chemo some years ago. I am on my 4 th round of cancer. I exercise like a demon and dont drink and have never smoked but I have never used supplements or alternative medicines. I am Stage 4 and in remission after 8 months. Best of luck Paula.

Posts.Title: Stage IV breast cancer spread to liver and bones

Posts.Content: When my mom died of cancer, I was 22 and pregnant. She died a long slow painful death at home. I had a baby a few weeks after her funeral. Nothing makes sense. But I decided to live a good life and help other people, always be kind and make people laugh.... in memory of my mom. That is all I could do. Life happens, things happen, I am an atheist and I believe everything is random and boils down to the luck of the draw. Live a good life for your friend. It will give you purpose. Best wishes Paula
Posts.Title: MY FRIEND DIED ON SUNDAY IM LOST.
MY FRIEND DIED ON SUNDAY IM LOST.
MY FRIEND DIED ON SUNDAY IM LOST.

Posts.Content: I really feel for you. I lost my mom to cancer when I was 8 months pregnant, I went thru hell and even thought about suicide. What you need to do is get a second opinion. Then if the news is not good you need to spend quality time with your mom and tell her you love her and dote on her. I am a mom and we understand that our kids have lives too. I am sure she is super proud of you for attempting an MBA. Put that on hold for now cos the time with your mom is precious now. Its going to be hard but if you give your mom your best and loving attention in her last days, you will not feel guilty if she passes. Try and find a clinical trial for her. Ask your doctor who to call. Dont be put off by doctors saying she has little time. My mom was given 6 weeks and she lived for 9 months. My email is if you want to chat. I have cancer too. Best wishes Paula
Posts.Title: Just told my mom is going to die of cancer...

Posts.Content: Regarding tumours and implants, I had a tumour on my implant in 2005. The tiny layer of subcutaneous tissue between the skin and the implant actually must have contained a few cancer cells after chemo! I was gobsmacked. But the tumour was easy to remove and I managed 10 years of remission. Hang in there! Paula.
Posts.Title: Advice needed

Posts.Content: Hi. Be very careful of alternative meds. All medication that is used to fight cancer by law has to go thru Clinical trials for years before it may or may not be used, based on the results of the trials, ie how many patients lived and how many died. Researchers, doctors and statisticians all check the results and then the results have to be rechecked by experts who had nothing to do with the trials. With alternative meds, anecdotal evidence is the only " proof". That means people who claim they are cured or who claim they know someone who was cured. This is not scientific. In the 1970's apricot seeds also known as B17 or Laetrile were hailed by some as a cure for cancer. My mother had end stage ovarian cancer in 79 and in desperation we gave her this meds. She died 9 months after diagnosis aged 48. Since then apricot seed cures have been disproved and debunked. Cancer is a very complicated disease and operates in a highly specialised manner, it will not be beaten by alternative meds. Be careful, you will part with a lot of money with no results. Best wishes Paula
Posts.Title: Apricot seeds for treating stage 4 breast cancer

Posts.Content: I had cancer in left breast. Opted to have both removed, I dont mess around! Doc was wary cos I was 38. 3 budding tumours were found in the right breast. I am so happy they are gone. Still here 20 years later, still fighting mets but would have been dead a lot earlier if I kept one or both of them. Love to all

Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: Hey. Very proud of you for kicking a bit of butt there! I had a double mastectomy in 1998, I still have trouble with my arms. I get tendonitis regularly, I cant use a pull up bar at the gym, cant use weights either. Basically from the research I have done, mastectomy seems to re jig everything. It messes with nerves and tendons etc. I too am an athlete, runner, tennis player, in good shape for 56, but it is what it is. You have to learn to live with it! Better to be over the hill than under it! Best regards Paula
Posts.Title: need advice..also if anyone out there is going thru what I'm going thru

Posts.Content: Just fyi, the latest research on cancer shows it secretes an enzyme to fool the immune system so that T cells dont kill the cancer cells. When cancer cells move from breast to lungs, they have to change and " think" in order to move thru lymph nodes, the blood stream and membranes. Cancer cells work out that chemo is killing them and they change their RNA to become immune to chemo. If you underestimate them, they will kill you. Building up your immune system is a myth. I am a 4 time cancer survivor. Chemo, radiation, double mastectomy and Arimidex have saved my life. Good luck Paula
Posts.Title: SCARED

Posts.Content: Hi. I feel bad now cos I forget that many people work full time. I have a part time job so I guess I am lucky! Do you sit at a desk all day or are you on the move? Even a 20 min walk every day is excellent for cardiac health. Take the stairs, dance at home! You can only do what you can do. Don't stress about it! Warm wishes.
Posts.Title: Arimidex..may not be working

Posts.Content: I thought the same about Arimidex. I had almost no side effects but 8 months later my cancer is VERY STABLE and not moving. My lung lesions have shrunk to nothing. Exercise is the key, keep fit and sleep in a very dark room at night. No light at all. Latest research shows that Arimidex works better when melotonin is made at night in your body and that is only made when its dark. Google it, sounds daft but it's true. I am 57, dont drink, run 3 times a week and sleep in the dark! My onc just shakes her head cos all my tests are beautiful and even the nurse asked " what are you doing here!" Love to all
Posts.Title: Arimidex..may not be working
